lead_paragraph: RABINOVITCH--Ralph D. MD. January 17, 1917, died December 23, 2015. Trained at Bellevue in Child Psychiatry under pioneer Lauretta Bender along with late wife Dr Sara Dubo. They co-founded Children's Psychiatric Hospital University of Michigan and Hawthorn Center for State of Michigan, an innovative and nationally renowned institution. Wrote influential papers on autism, dyslexia, graphic art in Psychiatry. His film "Stevie's Light Bulb" won Blue Ribbon at American Film Festival. Memorial Service January 31, 12:00. irakaufman.com 1/3
